pages.text: Since time immemorial, legends speak of profanities and blasphemies against the natural order in fortresses made of compacted souls.$(br2)These blasphemies are in the form of an object, and are referred to as the Codex Infernalis.

No rite, no knowledge from it is safe. The unclean are attracted to it, hoping to lead men astray and cast them into pits of burning fire, in exchange for profanities and power.$(br2)It is best to be left be, to rot in its chambers. Nothing good has ever come out of it.
